title: T205 Hoblitzell No Cin at National next week
author: Steve_NY

posts.post_title: T205 Hoblitzell No Cin at National next week
posts.post_content:
I will have an ungraded nice T205 Hoblitzell No Cin spelled correctly at my booth 1005P at this year's National Sports Collectors Convention, along with 100s of other tobacco cards. I'll be three booths down and 1 booth over; so I am the third booth in the second row from the main entrance.

I will have a nice T205 set for $25,000 cash (only) too.

Many T210 Old Mills.

200-300 T206's.

Much more.

See me at the show next Weds - Sunday outside of Chicago.

Steve Sabow
[url]Dynamictwo@aol.com[/url]

Is this the same set you had on display last year?

Matt E.
What's the price.   Got any pics?   Is this card FS here or is this self advertising in the wrong spot?
